rooms.description: Central open space with large windows for natural light and ventilation. Designed according to Vastu principles, positioning the entrance properly.
Adjacent to the Living Room with natural light access and view. Vastu compliant layout encouraging social interaction.
Efficiently planned kitchen with proper ventilation, natural lighting via skylights and windows. Incorporates Vastu recommendations regarding fire element placement.
Dedicated, quiet home office space with emphasis on natural light and minimal distraction. Features built-in storage for a clutter-free environment.
Spacious master bedroom with a dedicated balcony to ensure privacy and connection to nature. Vastu guidelines recommend north or east facing for relaxation.
Cozy library area with ample shelving and seating, located near natural light but away from direct sunlight to preserve book quality. Vastu principles are considered for enhancing concentration.
Includes utility rooms such as laundry and storage, located conveniently near the kitchen. Minimal intrusion on living spaces is ensured by strategic placement.

openings.description: Grand entrance with a wide door, ensuring good flow of positive energy (Vastu compliant) and inviting natural light into the lobby.
Large windows placed on east and north sides to maximize morning sunlight and promote air circulation, in line with Vastu.
Each bedroom has its own spacious balcony providing an outdoor space for relaxation and improved ventilation as per design requirements.
Skylights incorporated to enhance natural light and maintain energy efficiency, aligning with sustainable practices.
